titleStmt.title: Language resource management - Corpus Query Lingua Franca

info.p: The Corpus Query Lingua Franca (short CQLF) has been developed by the ISO/TC 37/SC 4/WG 6 since 2011. It is currently still in development, at the PWI stage (ISO/PWI 24623). The purpose of CQLF is to standardize the abstract model of a corpus query language. CQLF is to provide a set of recommendations, which should be considered as the guidelines in developing a new query language (QL) or a new functionality of an existing QL.
